param.name: initPos
param.help: Si 1 init la position et dimenssion de la fenêtre

param.name: TopMost
param.help: Si 1 La fenêtre est toujours au premier plan

param.name: MoveDas
param.help: Donne à la frame Das la même position et même taille que DAUIServer

param.name: borderstate
param.help: Type de bordure fenêtre windows (0 pas de bordure 4 bordure)

param.name: minimumrowheight
param.help: Valeur minimum hauteur élément liste snaps

param.name: dasupdate
param.help: Si true autorise la modification du fichier Das

param.name: URL_UI
param.help: Url pour acceder au site de l'UI

param.name: ColorStd
param.help: Couleur de remplacement si suppression scene virtuelle

param.name: OSCFrameToFocus
param.help: Si non vide nom de la fenêtre de l'application OSC pour passe en top automatique

snap.name: Amazing Grace
snap.comment:
(FA LA)Mado prend la place à Marie-Claire
  • Lead
  • Ohoh
  • Twas grace that taught my heart to fear And grace my fears (#) relieved. ↗️ How precious did that grace appear The hour I first believed.
  • Through many dangers toils and snares I have already (#] come. ↗️ This grace that brought me safe thus far. And grace will lead me home.

  • Amazing grace how sweet the sound That saved a wretch (#) like me. ↗️ I once was lost but now I'm found Was blind but now I see.

snap.name: Kumbaya
snap.comment:
(RE FA LA)
  • Ohoh
  • Lead Phlippe (nous => Kumbaya Kumbaya)
  • Some one's praying Lord,kumbaya
  • Some one's singing Lord,kumbaya
  • Laisser démarrer les basses puis Kumbaya Kumbaya
  • Fin lead seul

snap.name: Wade IN THE Water
snap.comment:
(MI)
  • Lead Mado
  • Début basses & alti => réponse Ténors Sopra
  • The leader looks like the israelite
  • It looks like the band that moses led
  • oh....

snap.name: Everybody sing freedom
snap.comment:
(SI ... DO ... DO RE)
Dans partie lente :
  • FREEDOM mains ouvertes
  • MOANING mains sur les épaules
dessinent un coeur
  • Lead Florence
  • Freedom
  • Moaning
  • Crying
  • Shooting

snap.name: I'm so glad
snap.comment: • DO+RE+DO+...RE+MI+RE+

snap.name: Down to the river to pray
snap.comment:
• (RE RE)
  • Sisters - Robe and crow
  • Brothers - Star by crown
  • Fathers - Robe and crown
  • Mothers - star by crown
  • Siners - Robe abd crown

snap.name: Go tell it on the mountain
snap.comment:
(LA)
  • X2 Go, tell it on the mountain Over the hills and everywhere Go, tell it on the mountain That Jesus Christ is born
  • While shepherds kept their watching - O'ver silent flocks by night - Behold throughout the heavens - There shone a Holy light
  • X2 Go, tell it ..
  • The shepherds feared and trembled - When, lo! Above the Earth - Rang out the angel chorus - That hailed our Savior's birth
  • X2 Go, tell it ..
  • Down in a lowly manger - Our humble Christ was born - And brought us all salvation - That blessed Christmas born
  • Oh .....
  • X2 Go, tell it on the mountain - Go tell it - Go, tell it Go, tell it on the mountain That Jesus Christ is born
  • Go, tell it - Go, tell it - Go, tell it - Go, tell it - That Jesus Christ is born

snap.name: I saw the light
snap.comment:
(LA) Bougie main gauche.
Fin blackout à déclencher legerement en avance.
  • I wandered so aimless, life filled with sin
    I wouldn't let my dear savior in
    Then Jesus came like a stranger in the night
  • Just like a blindman, I wandered along
    Worries and fears I claimed for my own
    Then like the blindman God gave back his sight
  • I was a fool to wander'n as stray
    straight is the gate and narrow the way
    Now I have trade the wrong for the right

snap.name: This little light
snap.comment:
(RE) Héléne prend la place à Marie-claire
Main droite <-> main gauche sur Shine Shine Shine
Fin deux mains ouvertes
Attention couplet de fin oh oh puis This little light...

snap.name: Keep your lamp
snap.comment:
(SOL)
  • 1 - 3 - 6 - 8
  • Keep your lamps trimmed and burning
  • Keep your lamps trimmed and burning
  • Keep your lamps trimmed and burning
  • For this old world it's almost done
  • 2 - 7
  • Brother don't you stop prayin
  • Sister keep right prayin
  • Brother don't you stop a cryin
  • For this old world it's almost done
  • 4 - 9
  • Mother don't you stop prayin
  • Father keep right prayin
  • Mother don't you stop a cryin
  • For this old world it's almost done
  • 5
  • Oh Oh Oh - Oh Oh Oh (X2)

snap.name: Oh Lord
snap.comment:
(Si SI puis DO+ DO+)
Attention au mixage de la voix de Christelle.

snap.name: Prayers for freedom
snap.comment:
(FA) Mixage : Guitare
Blessed river, polishing stones,
She is polishing our hearts, we are claiming our thrones,
To sit side by side in our awakened homes.
Love is always watching. Love is always watching.

Medicine giver, gentle spirit of the land
She is polishing our hearts in ways we do not understand
We walk side by side and offer both our hands

Brothers, sisters, brave pilgrims of the night
We have followed our hearts, and to truth we have arrived
To sit side by side in divinity's light

snap.name: Fix me Jesus
snap.comment: (LA) Lead : Marie-Claire - Christelle - Annie

snap.name: Remember me
snap.comment:
(ME)

  • WHEN MY TIME WILL BE OVER - IN THAT KINGDOWN OF FIRE - WOUNDED BY FEAR AND SUFFER - I BEG YOU PLEASE REMEMBER

  • WHEN I COME TO DISCOVER - THE CONTRY OF MY FATHER - SO FAR AWAY FROM DESPAIR - I BEG YOU PLEASE REMEMBER

  • WHEN I WILL CROSS THE RIVER - AND GET RID OF MY SQUALOR - I WILL MEET YOU MY FATHER - AND SEE YOUR BEGIN FOR EVER

snap.name: A home in the kingdom
snap.comment:
(DO SOL)
  • I do have Crown
  • I do have a robe
  • I do have room
  • I have a savior

snap.name: Amen
snap.comment: (SI) Lead : Christelle => ⚠️ + HF

snap.name: We wish you well
snap.comment:
(LA puis RE+ DO+ SI*2 puis RE+ MI+ FA+ FA+ DO+)

  • When you leave this place my lonely friend

  • When the show will stop for you

  • Don't forget this world

  • Remember the sound of the lord


  • When the trouble arrive in your life

  • When the night is falling down

  • Don't forget this world my friend

  • that the lord can bless your way

snap.name: Total praise
snap.comment:
(MI) Attention. Fin lumière sur dernier Amen puis blackout sur fin Amen.
Lord I will lift my eyes to the hills
Knowing my help is comin’ from You
Your peace You give me in time of the storm
You are the source of my strength
You are the strength of my life
I lift my hands in total praise to You
You are the source of my strength
You are the strength of my life
I lift my hands in total praise
I lift my hands in total praise to You

snap.name: Down by the riverside
snap.comment:
I'm gonna lay down burden...
Oh where
All right
Oh where

snap.name: Gamblin man
snap.comment:
Solo 3eme

So got gamble to his house
Laid him on the bed
He said some boddy give me fresh water
Pour it allround my head

snap.name: Let it shine
snap.comment:
Solo 2 fois

Let it Shine on me
Let it Shine on me
Let your light from the light-house
Shine on me

Monter sur From the light house aprés solo Loulou

snap.name: Oh happy day
snap.comment:
Oh happy
Décallé aprés Basse & Alti Happy day 2x
Oh happy day

Light : décaller déclenchement final Oh Happy Day

snap.name: I love Jesus
snap.comment:
Jesus -> Yes I do
My lord -> Yes I do
Jesus -> Why don't you

Mixage Attention voix Momone

snap.name: Wayfaring stranger
snap.comment:
I am a poor wayfaring stranger
Traveling through this world alone
There is no sickness, toil or danger
In that bright land to which I go
I'm going there to see my mother
I'm going there no more to roam
I'm going there over Jordan
I'm only going over home now

snap.name: My tribute
snap.comment:
How can I say thanks
For the things You have done for me
Things so undeserved
Yet You gave to prove Your love for me
The voices of a million angels
Could not express my gratitude
All that I am and ever hope to be
I owe it all to Thee

To God be the glory...

just let me live my life
Let it pleasing, Lord to Thee
And if I gain any praise
Let it go to Calvary

snap.name: Rock My Soul
snap.comment: <font color="#FF0000";>Mado prend la place de Marie-claire.</font>

snap.name: Thula sizwe
snap.comment: <font color="#FF0000";>Héléne prend la place à Christelle. Martine prend la place à Marie-claire.</font><u>Mixage</u> : Djembé

snap.name: Z_presentation
snap.comment: Ne pas oublier de se positionner sur la préparation pendant une présentation.
